primary_structure_type: large marine turtle with paddle-like flippers
primary_structure_color: olive to brown carapace with radiating patterns; greenish body fat
key_differentiating_features: Single pair of prefrontal scales between eyes
Four lateral scutes on each side of carapace
Paddle-shaped flippers with one visible claw
confusion_species_list: Caretta caretta (Loggerhead - larger head, two prefrontal scales)
Eretmochelys imbricata (Hawksbill - overlapping scutes, pointed beak)
sexual_dimorphism_notes: Males have longer tails extending beyond carapace and curved foreclaw claws
